com.leenmeij.app.models

Class Invoice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leenmeij.app.models.Invoice

  • public class Invoice
extends java.lang.Object
    Vehicle invoices are made in this class. The invoice holds the user and vehicle id, and the price aswell as the dates and additional information
    Author:
    Deam Kop (s1075228), Michiel Mooring, David
